style_property.title: Set style for FS Translator
style_property.value_parameters: HORIZONTAL=horizontal translate button VERTICAL=vertical translate button SIMPLE=simple translate button, with no text

style_property.title: Predefined positions for FS Translator
style_property.description: *use Custom position to add the template for instance in a widget, advertising positons or any other location. Just include cxf_google_translate_forum template anywhere you want to show the Google Translate.
style_property.value_parameters: above_notices=above notices below_notices=below notices below_bottom_breadcrumbs=below bottom breadcrumbs custom=custom
